entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C

Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 10:51 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

Visibility: 4.0 km

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
